welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Carleton Place, Canada! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and beautiful scenery, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith Falls Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Smith Falls Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal that primarily serves regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rockcliffe St Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
